title: Victory of Arshad Nadeem in Olympics to inspire youngsters: Tarar
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 09 (APP): Federal Minister for Information, Broadcasting, National Heritage and Culture Attaullah Tarar said on Friday that victory of athlete Arshad Nadeem in Paris Olympics will inspire youngsters to step forward in the world of sports.
In his congratulatory message, the minister said that Arshad Nadeem has proved with his hard work, dedication and ability that Pakistani players were second to none.
“You have created history by winning gold medal in Paris Olympics,” he said adding that Arshad Nadeem’s success was a beacon for every Pakistani youth.
He termed victory of Arshad Nadeem as the victory of the entire nation.
